mapper.select: SELECT teacher.id, teacher. NAME, school. NAME AS schoolname, school_level.`name` AS schoollevelname, `subject`. NAME AS subjectname, title. NAME AS titlename, teacher.isGood, teacher.age, teacher.image FROM teacher, title, `subject`, school, school_level WHERE school = school.id AND diploma = school_level.id AND `subject` = `subject`.id AND teacher.title = title.id ORDER BY id limit ${start}, ${end}
select count(id) as number, MONTH(time) as month from teacher GROUP BY MONTH(time)
SELECT COUNT(teacher.id) FROM teacher, subject where teacher.subject = subject.id and subject.name != '后勤'

SELECT count(teacher.id) FROM teacher, school, school_level, `subject` WHERE teacher.school = school.id AND school. LEVEL = school_level.id AND school_level. NAME = "小学" AND teacher. SUBJECT = `subject`.id AND `subject`. NAME != "后勤"

SELECT teacher.id, teacher. NAME, school. NAME AS schoolname, school_level.`name` AS schoollevelname, `subject`. NAME AS subjectname, title. NAME AS titlename, teacher.isGood, teacher.age, teacher.image FROM teacher, title, `subject`, school, school_level WHERE school = school.id AND diploma = school_level.id AND `subject` = `subject`.id AND teacher.title = title.id and teacher.name = '${name}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teacher (name, school, diploma, subject, title, isGood, age, image) VALUE ('${name}', ${school}, ${diploma}, ${subject}, ${title}, ${isGood}, ${age}, '${image}')
mapper.update: UPDATE teacher SET name = '${name}', school = ${school}, diploma = ${diploma}, subject = ${subject}, title = ${title}, isGood = ${isGood}, age = ${age}, image = '${image}' WHERE id = ${id}
